transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Ji sir, namaste. Main Shruti baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART head office se, senior manager. Sir, aapki na Stenuji ke saath baat hui thi, vo aapke account manager hain.
Customer: Haan. Thodi der baad main call karta hun is number pe. Main office mein hun.
Executive: Achha achha achha. Sir, aap mujhe time de dijiye, main aapko call kar lungi. 1:30 baje?
Customer: Haan. Main call karta hun aapko. 3:00-3:30 baje ka rakhiye na madam, 3:00 baje.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. No, no problem sir. Okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to discuss something with the customer.

Resolution:

- Customer asked the executive to call later.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer at 3:00-3:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- follow up, call scheduling
